title: Anton Lazutkin
text:
Anton Nikolayevich Lazutkin (; born 5 November 1994) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
He played his first game for the main squad of <a href="FC%20Rostov">FC Rostov</a> on 24 September 2015 in a <a href="Russian%20Cup%20%28football%29">Russian Cup</a> game against <a href="FC%20Tosno">FC Tosno</a>.
